import unittest



[docs]class TestSubtraktion(unittest.TestCase):


[docs]    def setUp(self):
        self.b = Bruch(3, 2)
        self.b2 = Bruch(self.b)
        self.b3 = Bruch(4, 2)
        pass



[docs]    def tearDown(self):
        del self.b, self.b2, self.b3
        pass



[docs]    def testminus(self):
        self.b = self.b - Bruch(4, 5)
        assert(float(self.b) == 0.7)



[docs]    def testminus2(self):
        self.b = self.b - self.b3
        assert(float(self.b) == -0.5)



[docs]    def testminus3(self):
        self.b2 = self.b - Bruch(1)
        assert(float(self.b2) == 0.5)



[docs]    def testiSubError(self):
        self.assertRaises(TypeError, self.b.__isub__, "other")



[docs]    def testrsubError(self):
        """TypeError!!!

        self.b2=2.0-self.b2
        """
        self.assertRaises(TypeError, self.b2.__rsub__, 2.0)



[docs]    def testiSub(self):
        self.b -= 2
        assert(self.b == Bruch(-1, 2))



[docs]    def testiSub2(self):
        self.b -= Bruch(2)
        assert(self.b == Bruch(-1, 2))



[docs]    def testrsub(self):
        self.b2 = 3 - Bruch(3, 2)
        assert(float(self.b2) == 1.5)



if __name__ == "__main__":
    unittest.main()
